summary: This is an email chain from February 13, 2020, introducing attorneys Nicole Moss, Chuck Cooper, and Haley Proctor to Sigrid McCawley. The attorneys from Cooper & Kirk PLLC express interest in meeting confidentially in NYC to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein matter, as they represent a client in an action against Alan Dershowitz in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email Introduction Regarding Epstein Matter
events.description: Sigrid McCawley introduces attorneys Nicole Moss, Chuck Cooper, and Haley Proctor to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein matter and a potential confidential meeting in NYC.

keyFacts: Attorneys from Cooper & Kirk PLLC (Chuck Cooper, Nicole Moss, Haley Proctor) are representing a client in an action against Alan Dershowitz in the Southern District of New York.
The attorneys express interest in meeting confidentially in New York City to discuss mutual interests in the Epstein matter.
Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP facilitated the introduction between the legal parties.
The email correspondence is dated February 13, 2020, indicating ongoing legal discussions related to Epstein and Dershowitz years after Epstein's death.
